Text: fascinating stuff, really enjoy this series. thanks.
I'm amazed how popular this is. Glad you all like it. It's the fourth and final part next Sunday, I'll upload asap. I can recommend the book as well.
Thank-you for the HD. Perhaps people are actually tiring of porn? Another that's fascinating__     http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7111873/How.Earth.Made.Us.2010.BluRay.1080p.DTS.x264-CHD_%5BPHD%5D
Mr. NoggintheNomad, I don't see how to PM, but would much like to discuss the technique for HD download of BBC. I use PC and am limited to standard def for dl-ing. Is get_iPlayer automator the soft?
Wife and I are loving this series...many thanks! :-)

@CIA: yes, get Iplayer Automator is what I use. If you're in the UK, you just select the HD version in iPlayer, then 'use current page'. If not in the UK, invest a few quid in Netshade, and select a UK proxy server. I assume you're using a Mac...?
Ah, sorry, missed the PC comment, CIA. Afraid I can't answer that one.
I'll have the final part ready Monday afternoon. I'm away Sunday night.
Thanks a lot for these! Has anyone managed to find subtitles for them? I founds Episode 1 on a private tracker with subs, so some might be floating around...

I couldn't find any other than at that private tracker, so I've uploaded English subs for the first three shows here: http://www.opensubtitles.org/en/search2/sublanguageid-all/moviename-exploring+china+culinary
@CIA_Ice: for further iPlayer download discussions, search for 'Leafy Putney' on Facebook.
